DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective trial : To determine concentration fusion protein MAT Fel d1 degranulates basophil cat dander allergic patient , comparison cat dander extract Fel d1 alone
DOC.brief_title: IVN-CAT-001A Performance CAST With Different Allergens Patients With Cat Dander Allergy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Patient Cat Dander Allergy evidence positive history 2 . Age : 18 75 year Exclusion criterion : 1 . Use oral corticosteroid , Chromoglycin , Ketotifen , immunosuppressive drug within last 2 month 2 . Psychiatric disorder result malcompliance 3 . Neg . IgE Cat dander
